ValidationRule.description: OPS 5156, SFCC-[578] Bypass validation for Wallet_Opportunity Record type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Wallet_Opportunity", RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Market_Data_Renewal", RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Market_Data", OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName) ),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Onboarding_Required__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a value within "Onboarding Required" for this Closed Won opportunity.
